name: Tzepharion
description: Tzepharion is a large fiend with a muscular build, characterized by its evil disposition and frightening presence in battle.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate others through rage and its soul displacement power creates a terrifying combat dynamic.
goals: Tzepharion typically seeks to overpower its enemies and manipulate others into chaos.
relations: Tzepharion may be encountered alongside other fiends or as part of a devilish hierarchy.
environment: Typically found in dark, infernal realms or during twisted rituals on the Material Plane.
strengths: Powerful melee attacks and abilities that incite rage in others make it a dangerous opponent.
weaknesses: It struggles against intelligent foes who can resist its rage-inducing abilities.
attacks: Multiattack includes a fierce bite and multiple claw strikes, all capable of dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Soul Jolt allows it to separate an enemy's soul from their body, incapacitating them and creating a unique strategic advantage in combat.
senses: Tzepharion has superior perception with a passive score of 17.
skills: It excels in Athletics and has notable skills in Perception and Survival, making it adept in physical encounters and environmental awareness.
additional_information: Immune to fire and poison damage.
Resistant to cold and non-magical physical attacks from non-silver weapons.
Has Devil's Sight, allowing vision in magical darkness.
Ability to incite rage in beasts and monstrosities, creating chaos in battle.
Benefits from Pack Tactics when allies are nearby.

fiend that incites rage in beasts
monster with powerful melee attacks and soul jolt ability
cunning devil that thrives in dark environments
fiend immune to fire and poison damage
